recommended_degree: Teknik Elektro, Teknik Instrumentasi, Teknik Manufaktur, Teknik Mesin, Teknik Perancangan Mekanik dan Mesin (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Assisting in preventive and corrective maintenance activities.
Helping to update maintenance logs and spare part records.
Supporting maintenance team during repair or inspection work.
Assisting in creating technical reports or equipment history.
Observing safety compliance during maintenance tasks.
